name: shaykhi-backend-js
description: Backend API for Quran teaching platform - Node.js, Express, Prisma, MySQL

scripts.db:setup: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.db:deploy: npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate:deploy && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.db:push: npm run prisma:generate && prisma db push && npm run prisma:seed
